faqs.question: What is UltraMsg ?
faqs.answer1: Ultramsg is a WhatsApp API provider and a gateway for working with messages.
faqs.answer2: If you are looking to contact your customers via WhatsApp or build your own WhatsApp solution (whether it is a CRM/ERP system, a chatbot, or some other platform), UltraMsg will be your perfect choice.

faqs.question: What can the UltraMsg do ?
faqs.answer2: You will be able to send all types of files and messages in WhatsApp,

faqs.question: Can I send bulk messages?
faqs.answer1: Ultramsg does not have a limit as to how many messages you can send.
faqs.answer3: we do not recommend sending more than 5000 messages day.
